description:
A set of accessories that can be worn by the main characters.
Features the following items:
- Yuri/Miu/Ren Exclusive Costume: Camera Obscura Hat 
- Yuri/Miu Exclusive Costume:  Witch's Hat

Note: This content is included for free with purchases made before October 27th, 2021. It is possible it will be sold separately at a later date.
name: Yuri/Miu/Ren Exclusive Costume: Camera Obscura Hat & Yuri/Miu Exclusive Costume:  Witch's Hat
